reuters.title: BANK OF BOSTON EXPECTS 1ST QTR EARNINGS FROM 90 CTS TO 1.00 DLRS/SHR VS 79 CTS
reuters.body: BDM International Inc said it has received a U.S. Army contract with a base year value of 1,400,000 dlrs to support the plans and operations staff of the U.S. Army Joint Readiness Training Center, based at Little Rock Air Force Base. The company said with three option years, total value would be about 7,200,000 dlrs. Reuter 
